DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety efficacy MBI 226 2.5 % 5.0 % Acne Solutions , apply topically six week , treatment acne .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy MBI 226 2.5 % 5.0 % Topical Acne Solutions Treatment Acne
DOC.criteria: Males female , age 13 , exhibit high level facial P. acne Presence inflammatory noninflammatory lesion Acne conglobata , acne fulminans , secondary acne ( chlorine , druginduced acne , etc . ) Active facial cyst
